Allah itlatuf (god intervened with mercy) it was a matter of minutes. I was caught up on my way down to the floor below with my manager having a silly discussion when the blast happened. And the whole lower floor was full of blood, everyone had to be taken to the hospital. We were so scared to move. Because there were two we expected a third. We all thought we were being blasted. Because of this we created a fireman (Ed) who was sewn in response, it was a determination for us that ^&*$# it we're staying. We're doing this for the country despite all the @^&*( we're living through. It was created after the blast as a demonstration that we want to manufacture here, we want to create jobs, we want to build something for the kids that are deprived of toys, their childhood even. I was done with school, I had graduated and there was hyperinflation. I felt I had to get a job to help the family sustain. I was actively looking and feeling panic and we were as a family operating on savings. My dad was telling me that my retirement was less than 10,000 dollars, imagine that. [[Code: Financial]] So it was crazy. I noticed I’m using the word “Frustrated a lot” - Munir mentioned that I was “frustrated a lot” and it stood out to me. I realized that being frustrated is not productive while you’re in a startup because you need to be innovative and creative and being frustrated doesn’t help you come up with new ideas. [[Code: Value-Self knowledge]] I got this thing with berrytech and finally I relaxed. [[Code: Safety]]","uid":"n5zY9adI5","edit-time":1622735291501,":block/refs":[{":block/uid":"B9cKp4XIm"},{":block/uid":"fLdmDto6l"},{":block/uid":"X0wnSh4gZ"}],":edit/user":{":user/uid":"OExdZZP8Xgdv4n4JK3xiq0GWER22"}},{"refs":[{"uid":"es6d2JXjJ"},{"uid":"riK5iZ1Ah"}],"string":"All the calls were really so helpful. I’m the kind of person who always comes up with ideas in conversation. I was talking with my designer and had an idea, started sketching and it was an unannounced brainstorming session. [[Code: Social-Support]][[Code: Value-Creativity]]. We sketched almost half of the book. My contract ends in June with Berrytech and I am very confident that I will get another opportunity somewhere else. I’ve been doing a lot of good [[Code: Personality Trait]]","uid":"NOGo8AZAJ","edit-time":1622637931825,":block/refs":[{":block/uid":"J-NCj_e-A"}],":edit/user":{":user/uid":"OExdZZP8Xgdv4n4JK3xiq0GWER22"}}],"string":"What did the accelerator mean during the blast period?","uid":"xDz4XQw4U","edit-time":1621942521261,":edit/user":{":user/uid":"OExdZZP8Xgdv4n4JK3xiq0GWER22"}},{"children":[{"refs":[{"uid":"0gvqmH1vr"},{"uid":"qjjylXcFm"}],"string":"I strongly believe that entrepreneurs will save the region. We’re non-partisan, non-political, we’re grassroots, we’re in pain and from the pain we’re trying to do good and create products. I’m very proud of all the people working in startups, especially the people empowering people, teaching people how to think, sharing new skills. Everything involving human development is multiplied by 2000% because that’s someone doing something new and it has a ripple effect. When you empower a person you empower many more indirectly. Entities like Nawaya, Enjaz, Dot, who are getting money from outside, empowering people to start coming up with projects and I’m very happy with the sessions they give. I start telling them - I know the situation is hard, you need to make money, dollars, not Lebanese. The country has a lot of raw materials, but our minds are not industrial, when you think about how much goodness is in the country. As simple as flowers, honey, how can we innovate? The plentitude of potatoes in Bekaa? Create a market for you. Make the spoons from honey, it’s very nice. I buy it because we can, companies are making money. WHat can we invent. Create new products from the earth, learn e-commerce, we’re teaching you ecommerce. Learn the tools, it’s for free. As much as I can I’m trying to share this. Don’t make the same product and sell it in the same village. In Beirut no one makes authentic “mooneh” - we look for the people who do? There’s lots of people like me and expats who’re looking for Lebanese products, the smell of the region. [[Code: Expat-support]] The entities are teaching the skills they need to transform the resources around them into products. And this is how we will emerge from our problem, it’s industrialization and creating products. [[Code: Vision]]","uid":"9_P-Iwcr6","edit-time":1622737534257,":block/refs":[{":block/uid":"0gvqmH1vr"},{":block/uid":"qjjylXcFm"}],":edit/user":{":user/uid":"OExdZZP8Xgdv4n4JK3xiq0GWER22"}}],"string":"What role do you see entrepreneurs having in a place like Lebanon given the current situation?","uid":"klMzUxz5U","edit-time":1621942521261,":edit/user":{":user/uid":"OExdZZP8Xgdv4n4JK3xiq0GWER22"}},{"children":[{"refs":[{"uid":"VkqwtKL2v"},{"uid":"GZuEPPSxs"},{"uid":"W4n9N8M8Y"},{"uid":"qjjylXcFm"}],"string":"I won't lie, sometimes I feel like leaving too. Why do I think about it? To keep this engine/enthusiasm/giving to people I have to feel secure[[Code: Feeling-Fear]]. Not that I will die at any instant. So much is online so I can do so much of my work online. I can be effective even if I’m not physically in the country. I think of my safety, my family… and my earnings. Now I’m fine. After a while will I still be fine? I’m investing from my income, will I still be able to invest in my team? That’s the one thing I’m thinking about. [[Code: Feeling-secure]] [[Code: Feeling-Gratitude]] I’m investing in the base, raising this “child” so that one day the company will come and pay me back and take care of me when I’m older. Thank goodness God has given me a salary. I see tangible results. We’re going to print the book and sell it and make money from it. I can see it all. [[Code: Vision]] It’s not like we’re playing and not doing anything.","uid":"l6sdwIes8","edit-time":1622749660104,":block/refs":[{":block/uid":"VkqwtKL2v"},{":block/uid":"GZuEPPSxs"},{":block/uid":"W4n9N8M8Y"},{":block/uid":"qjjylXcFm"}],":edit/user":{":user/uid":"OExdZZP8Xgdv4n4JK3xiq0GWER22"}}],"string":"What do you say the people leaving?","uid":"_WEMCby3Q","edit-time":1621942521261,":edit/user":{":user/uid":"OExdZZP8Xgdv4n4JK3xiq0GWER22"}}],"refs":[{"uid":"Z9sT2JL1G"},{"uid":"zH5SnapsD"}],"string":"[[Concluding Statements]][[002 Interview]]","uid":"S4-AhGviG","edit-time":1621943815099,":block/refs":[{":block/uid":"Z9sT2JL1G"},{":block/uid":"zH5SnapsD"}],":edit/user":{":user/uid":"OExdZZP8Xgdv4n4JK3xiq0GWER22"}}],"uid":"Z9sT2JL1G","edit-time":1620699211454,":edit/user":{":user/uid":"OExdZZP8Xgdv4n4JK3xiq0GWER22"}}]

I get the guidance that I need. If I don't invest in myself there's nothing more worthy. When I was financially strong enough to invest in myself it was the most important thing I could do.
